statements: DELETE FROM fast_food_menu_items WHERE calories > 500 AND fat_grams < 10
DELETE FROM fast_food_menu_items WHERE carbohydrates > 50 AND protein < 20
DELETE FROM menu_items WHERE calories < 200 AND fat_g < 10
DELETE FROM menu_items WHERE protein_g > 20 AND (carb_g < 50 OR fat_g < 15)
DELETE FROM item_ingredients WHERE item_id = 3 AND ingredient_id = 5;
DELETE FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id IN (SELECT ingredient_id FROM item_ingredients WHERE item_id = 1);
DELETE FROM menu_items WHERE calories > 500 AND carbs < 50;
DELETE FROM ingredients WHERE fat_per_unit > 10 AND protein_per_unit < 5;
DELETE FROM restaurants WHERE location = 'New York';
